subs.text: Idea: CNN, MSNBC, NYT, WP, WSJ etc jointly maintain a website with current best practice re the virus. it’s now irrefutable that the government is propaganda only, no science. Fill the void. Don’t let truth become partisan.

NakedJen is now on "Clubhouse". To Jen, some people are on all the time. I'm not one of them, at least not yet. But I want to hang out with you, so if you want to chat with me, send me a ping. Best way is to start a room, and click + and invite me. I'll get notification on my phone. I may not show up. That's the protocol. Love that you're there!

Trailblazers podcast about podcasting. The segment with my interview starts around minute 11. I also get the last word. It came out perfectly, couldn't have asked for a better review of my role in podcasting. I only wish my Mom were around to hear this. :boom:
BTW, my new bio was for the Trailblazers people.
A simple pointed question to start the day. Who lost the 2016 election for president?
